channel.name: Detroit Public TV US
channel.title: Best of Sewing With Nancy
channel.desc: Joanne Ross, Sewing and Stitchery Expo founder; pattern designer Pati Palmer; fabric designer Tula Pink; Vogue Patterns editor Kathy Marrone; sewing teacher Candice Jewett; students Tina Torrey, Kathy Ackley, Brittany Revel and Debbie Wilson.
